pageContext.collection_description: A private collection of broadcasts of sporting events, including many regular season and World Series baseball games dating back to 1933, regular season and Bowl football games dating back to around 1935, basketball games, auto racing, including a few Indy 500s, many boxing matches dating back to 1936, a limited pre-1960 golf collection and some event highlights such as horse racing, mainly Kentucky Derbys dating back to the mid-1930s, and several NHL hockey games and highlights dating back to 1945.
